resources.string:
This program is designed to retrieve current orientation from gyroscope, accelerometer and magnetometer using Madgwick filter. 

To start measuring, press "Start". 
To get sensors' specifications, press "Info" -> "Sensors' specs". 
To change measuring rate, press "Speed" and choose desired option. 
To stop measuring, press "Stop". 

The application supports sleep mode. On resume, it will continue writing data to the same file. 
(Note: after resuming the sensors immediately continue working, so no actions are required) 

Warning: the application won't work without the writing files permission, so it is strongly recommended to accept it.
